com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: TOKEN
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Private access token for the Git repository

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: ARTEFACTS_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Relative path where the playbook hosts and config are present.

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: COLLECTIONS_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Relative path where the tar files are present

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: PRIVATE_KEY
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: SSH private key for accessing the remote machines.

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: ANSIBLE_TAGS
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Values to pass to the --tags parameter

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: ANSIBLE_SKIP_TAGS
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Values to pass to the --skip-tags parameter

hudson.model.StringParameterValue.name: ANSIBLE_LIMIT
hudson.model.StringParameterValue.description: Values to pass to the --limit parameter

hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.name: AIR_GAPPED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterValue.description: Specify if the environment is air-gapped

org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: def javaVersion = sh(script: 'java -version 2>&1 | grep version', returnStdout: true).trim() echo "Java Version: ${javaVersion}"
def pythonVersion = sh(script: 'python3 --version 2>&1', returnStdout: true).trim() echo "Python Version: ${pythonVersion}"
def ansibleVersion = sh(script: 'ansible --version 2>&1 | grep ansible', returnStdout: true).trim() echo "Ansible Version: ${ansibleVersion}"
